template.name: AEalRemapColor
template.label: alRemapColor
template.description: Use controls such as gamma, saturation and contrast to tweak the color values in your network. Operations are applied in the order they appear in the shader.

attribute.name: gamma
attribute.label: Gamma
attribute.description: Gamma value to apply to input.

attribute.name: saturation
attribute.label: Saturation
attribute.description: Saturation to apply to the input.

attribute.name: hueOffset
attribute.label: Hue offset
attribute.description: Hue offset to apply to the input.

attribute.name: contrastPivot
attribute.label: Pivot
attribute.description: Value around which to pivot the contrast adjustment.

attribute.name: gain
attribute.label: Gain
attribute.description: Gain multiplier to apply to the input.

attribute.name: exposure
attribute.label: Exposure
attribute.description: Exposure adjustment to apply to the input, i.e. input * 2^exposure.

attribute.name: mask
attribute.label: Mask
attribute.description: Use this to mask off the adjustment. This can be useful for only adjusting a certain region of a texture for instance.
